Description: This parameter specifies the maximum system
current. This is the lower value of the maximum
motor current and the maximum power stage
current. If no motor is connected, only the
maximum power stage current is taken into
This parameter is only needed for commissioning
of encoder 2 in case of an indeterminable
Modbus address of parameter with invalid value.
